title: Forbidden Forest Ritual Site Adventure #31
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Ancient Ritual Clearing
rooms.description: A circular clearing deep in the forbidden forest, surrounded by towering ancient trees. Moonlight filters through the canopy, illuminating a ring of standing stones covered in glowing runes. The air hums with mystical energy. Moss and vines cover everything, and the scent of earth and old magic fills your lungs.

items.name: circle of standing stones
items.description: Massive stones arranged in a perfect circle, each carved with ancient symbols
items.text: The runes tell a story: 'In the year 333, the Forest Keeper sealed this sacred place. Three guardians protect the way: the Owl of Wisdom, the Wolf of Strength, and the Raven of Secrets.'

items.name: moss covered stone altar
items.description: A flat stone altar in the center of the circle, covered in thick green moss

items.name: ceremonial silver dagger
items.description: An ornate dagger with a silver blade etched with forest symbols

items.name: moss covered wooden chest
items.description: An old chest bound with iron, hidden beneath layers of moss and roots

items.name: Forest Keeper's journal
items.description: A leather bound book with pages preserved by magic
items.text: Journal of the Forest Keeper: I am Elara Thornwood, guardian of this sacred grove. The ritual requires three tokens: the Feather of Wisdom, the Fang of Strength, and the Eye of Secrets. Only then can one enter the Inner Sanctum and complete the ancient rite.

items.name: hollow rotting log
items.description: A fallen tree trunk with compartments carved into its interior

items.name: weathered note
items.description: A note written in faded ink on bark paper
items.text: Remember: The year of sealing is the key to the hidden compartment. The standing stones remember when this place was locked away from the world.

items.name: rusted iron key
items.description: A heavy iron key covered in rust and forest debris

items.name: overgrown forest path
items.description: A narrow path leading north, blocked by thick vines that need to be cut

rooms.name: Grove of the Three Guardians
rooms.description: A mystical grove where three ancient trees stand in a triangle formation. Each tree has a hollow at its base containing a stone statue: an owl, a wolf, and a raven. Ethereal mist swirls around the ground, and the trees seem to whisper secrets. A massive wooden door carved with intricate patterns stands at the far end.

items.name: stone owl statue
items.description: A weathered statue of an owl with knowing eyes, positioned in the northern tree
items.text: Inscription beneath: 'The Owl of Wisdom guards knowledge. Seek wisdom in the Library of Leaves, where ancient texts are preserved.'

items.name: stone wolf statue
items.description: A fierce statue of a wolf with bared fangs, positioned in the western tree
items.text: Inscription beneath: 'The Wolf of Strength guards power. Its fang rests in the Den of Shadows, where the strong survive.'

items.name: stone raven statue
items.description: A mysterious statue of a raven with gleaming eyes, positioned in the eastern tree
items.text: Inscription beneath: 'The Raven of Secrets guards mysteries. Its eye sees all from the Nest of Whispers, where secrets are kept.'

items.name: hollow in owl tree
items.description: A deep hollow in the base of the northern tree

items.name: Feather of Wisdom
items.description: A pristine white feather that glows with soft light, one of the three ritual tokens

items.name: hollow in wolf tree
items.description: A dark hollow in the base of the western tree

items.name: Fang of Strength
items.description: A large wolf fang carved from bone, one of the three ritual tokens

items.name: hollow in raven tree
items.description: A mysterious hollow in the base of the eastern tree

items.name: Eye of Secrets
items.description: A polished black stone shaped like an eye, one of the three ritual tokens

items.name: three sided pedestal
items.description: A stone pedestal with three indentations, each shaped for one of the guardian tokens
items.text: Ancient text carved into the pedestal: 'Place the three tokens to prove your worth. Then answer the questions of the forest to enter the Inner Sanctum.'

items.name: ancient wooden door
items.description: A massive door carved from a single piece of ancient wood, covered in protective runes. Three questions are burned into its surface.

password_questions.question: Who was the Forest Keeper?
password_questions.hint: Check the Forest Keeper's journal in the ritual clearing

password_questions.question: Where does the Owl guard knowledge?
password_questions.hint: Read the inscription beneath the owl statue

password_questions.question: Where does the Raven keep secrets?
password_questions.hint: The raven statue's inscription reveals this location

rooms.name: Inner Sanctum of the Forest
rooms.description: You have entered the heart of the forbidden forest! A magnificent chamber within a living tree, its walls formed by intertwined roots and branches. In the center, a pool of crystal clear water reflects the stars above, even though you are deep underground. Ancient magic pulses through the air. A shaft of pure moonlight descends from above, illuminating a portal of swirling green energy.

items.name: sacred crystal pool
items.description: A pool of water so clear it seems like liquid light, reflecting impossible stars

items.name: throne of living wood
items.description: A throne grown from the tree itself, covered in flowering vines
items.text: Inscription on the throne: 'The ritual is complete. The forest accepts you as its guardian. May you protect this sacred place as Elara Thornwood once did.'

items.name: display of ritual artifacts
items.description: Ancient tools and tokens from past Forest Keepers, preserved in alcoves of living wood

items.name: portal of moonlight
items.description: A swirling portal of green and silver energy, offering passage back to the mortal world. It requires the three guardian tokens to activate.

rooms.name: Edge of the Forbidden Forest
rooms.description: You emerge at the edge of the forbidden forest as dawn breaks. The trees behind you seem to bow in farewell. The ritual is complete, and the forest has accepted you as its new guardian. The path ahead leads back to civilization, but you carry the forest's blessing with you.

items.name: rays of morning sunlight
items.description: Warm sunlight breaking through the trees, marking the end of your journey

items.name: mark of the Forest Keeper
items.description: A glowing symbol on your hand, proof of your bond with the ancient forest

rooms.win_message: You have completed the ancient ritual and been accepted as the new Forest Keeper! The forbidden forest recognizes you as its guardian, and the spirits of the three guardians bow to you. Elara Thornwood's legacy lives on through you. The forest's magic flows through your veins, and you emerge into the dawn as a protector of the sacred grove. You win!
